00031 template< typename Container>
00032 void erAlignementSegmentContour( Container &seg)
00033 {
00034   typename Container::iterator itseg, itseg_chain, itseg_chain2;
00035   Container seg_chain;
00036   itseg = seg.begin( );
00037   seg_chain.push_back( *itseg);
00038   do 
00039     { 
00040       itseg_chain2 = seg_chain.end();
00041       CgalPoint prt = (*itseg_chain2).target();
00042       itseg_chain = erFindCgalSegment( seg.begin( ), seg.end( ), prt); 
00043       seg_chain.push_back( *itseg_chain);
00044     }
00045   while( (*itseg_chain).target() == (*itseg).source());
00046   seg = seg_chain;
00047 };

00079 template< typename Iterator>
00080 Iterator erFindCgalSegment( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CgalPoint punto)
00081 {
00082   while( p1 != p2)
00083     {
00084       if( ( (*p1).source()).operator == (punto))
00085         {
00086           return p1;
00087           break;
00088         }
00089       if( ( (*p1).target()).operator == (punto))
00090         {
00091           *p1 = (*p1).opposite();
00092           return p1;
00093           break;
00094         }
00095       p1++;
00096     }
00097   return p2;
00098 };

00101 template< typename Iterator>
00102 Iterator erFindCgalPoint( Iterator p1, Iterator p2, CgalPoint punto)
00103 {
00104   while( p1 != p2)
00105     {
00106       if( (*p1).operator == (punto))
00107         {
00108           return p1;
00109           break;
00110         }
00111       p1++;
00112     }
00113   return p2;
00114 };
